title: Habit Tracking Pattern Generator
prompt:
Follow the examples below to create a new habit-tracking plan:
Example 1:
Habit: Drinking water
Tracking: 8 glasses daily, mark it
Example 2:
Habit: Reading
Tracking: 30 minutes every day, log start and end time
Now continue:
Habit: {habit_name}
Tracking:

responses.gpt-5:
Habit: Writing
Tracking: Write 500 words daily, note word count and time spent
responses.gemini-2.5:
Habit: Writing
Tracking: 250 words daily, track the word count and time spent
responses.claude-3:
Habit: Writing
Tracking: 500 words daily, record word count and time spent writing

This follows the pattern of your examples by specifying a concrete, measurable goal (500 words) with a clear tracking method (recording the word count and time). You could adjust the word count target based on your personal writing goals—some people might prefer 250 words, others 1000—but the key is having a specific number to aim for and a simple way to log your progress each day.
